title: Guys the "hour of need" dealio is clearly the new turrets
body:
we keep saying turrets are too weak so they went and made them unstoppable colossus and you'll spend the whole game trying to avoid their wrath as they battle for the nexus.

for real tho if it's galio like a bunch of people keep preaching they would have to do so much more work making all of his skins fit this style.
I'm hoping for some tanky champ with a focus on supporting the team instead of flash damagey plays

replies.body: heres an idea, galeo is now a turret

He is a tank though, more of a vanguard like {{champion:113}} though. He gets even tankier because his ult + when he uses his shield on himself. Even if he doesn't have 4k health, he certainly isn't squishy.

Honestly it looks way more like aatrox and he has a huge update in pbe i know theyve stated galio is next but they might of changed there minds because of the communities petetions to fix aatrox over galio

> [{quoted}](name=fallenreaper88,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=clRihd44,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-03T00:52:06.472+0000)
>
> Honestly it looks way more like aatrox and he has a huge update in pbe i know theyve stated galio is next but they might of changed there minds because of the communities petetions to fix aatrox over galio

Why would they address Aatrox once in a minor patch, then almost immediately afterwards in a major update? Among the many major updates to champions or otherwise that needed to be addressed, Riot had already exclaimed that Galio was very close to the top of the list. So if anything stony and threatening is getting updated, it's him.

A turret update/rework sounds nice though.

> [{quoted}](name=fallenreaper88,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=clRihd44,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-03T00:52:06.472+0000)
>
> Honestly it looks way more like aatrox and he has a huge update in pbe i know theyve stated galio is next but they might of changed there minds because of the communities petetions to fix aatrox over galio

I disagree heavily. These things take about half a year to develop, and Galio has been in development (publically at least) for over six months now. There's no way they'd scrap him and somehow develop a new model for Aatrox in a matter of two weeks for pretty much no reason.

I wouldn't be shocked if Riot made Galio a Darkin who turned to stone, and now serves as the protector of Demacia. That would make him fit in the world of Runeterra while still fulfilling the Garegoyal themeatic. (It would also explain why he has similarities with Aatrox)
I never said they scrapped him i just dont think its actually a teaser for galio cause aatrox has major work on pbe and the silohete looks like the current aatrox
Aatrox is not a major rework at all. When this turns out to be Galio and you see the kit, then you'll see what is really a major rework.
Poor word choice i know what a major rework really is.

> [{quoted}](name=fallenreaper88,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=clRihd44,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-03-03T03:40:45.952+0000)
>
> I never said they scrapped him i just dont think its actually a teaser for galio cause aatrox has major work on pbe and the silohete looks like the current aatrox

Silhouette-wise, since they're not going to change up Aatrox's visual, it is too wide.

'Trox has a lean physique while the figure in the picture has a more overall built frame.

It was said,that Galio will probably come out before the next champion and overall it fits in terms of development time(VGUs usually take ~6 months and its been almost 6 months since the Yorick rework).

Not to mention that this is something demacia related that is made of stone and has wings,which would be far too similar to Galio if it was another champion.

Wasn't Warwick considered a full VGU though? He just came out recently. It's been awhile since a new champion though, so maybe they're pushing them back to release Galio (if the teaser is for Galio)...?

Warwick was made by the team that made Ryzes rework.
And Ryzes rework came out ~6 months before Warwicks.(the same team also made Taric,its just that Ryze was super fast because they had so much leftovers from his previous rework)

There are 2 teams working on VGU's:
One team was working on Yoricks VGU and moved on to Galio now and the other team worked on Warwicks VGU and is now working on Urgot I think.

yup

Team Alpha is currently working Galio and will be moving on to Evelynn after
Team Bravo who worked on Warwick are now onto Urgot
